src_original: yā lokottarā nātmadṛṣṭisamutthitā na sa.........najīvan soṣaṇapuruṣanapudgalanamanujanamānavadṛṣṭisamutthitā  nocchedaśāśvatadṛṣṭisamutthitā na bhavavibhavadṛṣṭisamutthitā na kuśalāvyākṛtadṛṣṭisamutthitā,  yā ca na saṃsāranirvāṇadṛṣṭisamutthitā /
tgt_original: 謂於是見超諸世間，不從我見、人見、眾生見、壽者見之所發生，亦不從常見斷見、有見無見、善不善見乃至涅槃見之所發生。

src_original: yaiḥ saṃkalpai rāgadveṣa mohakleśāḥ samuttiṣṭhanti,  tān saṃkalpān na saṃkalpayati /
tgt_original: 謂分別貪、瞋、癡等及諸煩惱，令不發起；

src_original: yaiḥ(saṃ)kalpaiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñā vimuktidarśanaskandhāḥ samuttiṣṭhanti,  tān saṃkalpān saṃkalpayati /
tgt_original: 分別戒、定、慧、解脫、解脫知見，令得安住。

src_original: yayā rāge nātmānaṃ na parāṃśca tāpayati,  nātmānaṃ na parāṃśca kleśayati,  nātmānaṃ parānnānupahanti,  tayā samāhitayuktayā vācā samanvāgato bhavati,  yayā samyagvā samavavadati,
tgt_original: 謂於自他善友言無彼此，具足相應入平等道。
謂於黑業報使無造作，令彼盡盡；

src_original: tatkarma nābhisaṃskaroti,  yatkarma kṛṣṇaśuklavipākaṃ kṛṣṇa(kṛtsna?)  (karma)  kṣayāya saṃvartate,  tatkarmābhisaṃskaroti /  satkarmābhisaṃskaroti,  satkarmapratiśaraṇakarmāntaḥ,
tgt_original: 於白業報自類和合，令善純熟。

src_original: yadārthavaśena guṇasaṃlekhādutsarjanatā na kuhanatā na lapanatā na naiṣpeṣikatā sṛvatāravācāśīlatā(?)  paralokeṣūśakutā(?)  ātmalokasaṃtuṣṭiḥ anavayatā āryāntajñātājīvitā,
tgt_original: 謂聖族弟子荷負重擔為聖道故，增長圓滿資養身命，不以雜亂欺誑惡求多求，他所得利不生悔惱，於自利養隨其所得不生憙樂。
